TopicTitle: AeroSpace V-17 VTOL Jet w/ Video Demonstration

Articles.Content:
**Hello everyone and I bring you the latest technology in which has been exported out from the ASEP Laboratory (Aero Space Expansion Pack) in which is claimed to be release with a whole new bread of aircrafts on July 9, 2015. Nevertheless, I present the AeroSpace V-17 VTOL Jet yet another agile fast VTOL that was able to travel to the North Pole and land successfully with enough fuel to get back home.**

**You can download it here:** [https://www.dropbox.com/s/l5bvpfhcaxtkp52/AeroSpace%20V-17%20Jet.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/l5bvpfhcaxtkp52/AeroSpace%20V-17%20Jet.craft?dl=0)
